title: 92x16: Designation of Charity to Receive Payment Subject to the Honoraria Ban
summary:
OGE advises on whether an individual can evade violating the honoraria ban by diverting funds to a third-party charitable organization.  

Notes: [Note: The honoraria ban was held unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court in U.S. v. National Treasury Employees Union, 513 U.S. 454 (1995).]
